Name: Base Station Renewal Hunt's Point Car Service, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of the application of Hunts Point Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of the Bronx.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one. The application of  Hunts Point Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 1303 Bronx River Avenue in the borough of The Bronx, which application was approved by the taxi and limousine commission, is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 


LS#38
01/15/98
